name: Web Config Changer
description: Swap out the value pair within a web.config file.
author: Ray Lomax
helpMarkDown: Swap out the value pair within a web.config file.

inputs.name: Keys
inputs.label: Array of keys to locate.
inputs.helpMarkDown: Array of keys to locate and swap out the value  i.e. (configuration/appSettings/add).

inputs.name: newValues
inputs.label: Array of values to replace .
inputs.helpMarkDown: Array of values to swap out the existing values i.e. ('bob', '12', '13/09/1999').

inputs.name: attribute
inputs.label: Attribute.
inputs.helpMarkDown: Attribute to use which will be swapped out i.e 'value'.
